translations: v．散步，闲逛：在公共场所或户外漫步，通常是为了休闲、娱乐或展示。
· The couple was promenading along the beach.
这对夫妇正在沙滩上漫步。

sentences.sentence: I am fond of promenading on a path so carpeted: even the rattling noise of high-heeled shoes drowns in its silence.
sentences.translation: 我喜欢走在铺着这样地毯的小径上，没有了高跟鞋跟与地面的磕碰声。

sentences.sentence: Going through the Bois I looked at all the rich cunts promenading in their limousines. They were whizzing by as if they had some destination.
sentences.translation: 穿过波伊思时我看着所有坐在高级轿车里出风头的阔娘儿们，她们呼啸而过，仿佛有一个目的地似的。
